name: wrapper-snippets
description: A VS Code extension that allows user to customize code snippets that wraps variables. Eg. a.test => Test::new(a)

WrapperSnippets.configureNotice.markdownDescription: To configure this extension, please go to [settings.json](command:workbench.action.openSettingsJson).
WrapperSnippets.configureNotice.default: Note: Click the link to open settings.json and add `"WrapperSnippets.wrappers": []`.

key.description: The trigger key for the snippet. This will be displayed after typing '.'

wrap_template.description: The template for wrapping code. Use {} to represent the variable to wrap.

fileSuffix.description: The file suffix to apply this wrapper (e.g., md for .md files, js for .js files, all).
